name: Gambler's Fall-acy
description:
Made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Legends speak of Gambler's Fall, a dungeon which holds treasure and peril in equal measure. Today, another soul tests his luck within the depths.

Defeat waves of dice-borne monsters to extract the essence of chance from their vessels, fueling your magic and furthering your descent into the dungeon Gambler's Fall!

[KNOWN ISSUE] On certain machines, when grabbing a die out of storage, the die sprite will be visually offset from your cursor.

=== Credits: ===
Art/Direction - Jessica Wake [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9zGdHW5Ld6i-4aqWcBr0eQ]
Soundtrack - Sophie Martin [https://twitter.com/h_mAAm_h]
Sound Design / Programming - Autumn Moulios [https://soundcloud.com/strawberry-moondae]
Programming - Evergreen [https://twitter.com/EvergreeenQueen]
Programming - Codebolt (https://codebolt.itch.io/)
